text: Hello all! Is there a better Search Module than the HubSpot's native one? I've tried in many ways, but it doesn't index all the pages. I like SiteSearch360, but it's a payed plugin. Can anyone help?
We use Sajari sometimes but it isn’t free. I don’t know of any free ones.
Which pages is it not indexing?
